item.title: Mexus Gold US 10-K
item.description: Mexus Gold US, which is in the Gold & Silver Ores [1040] industry, SEC 10-K filing on July 01, 2021 had 21460 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 442 instances days - 271 instances interest - 266 instances stock - 247 instances 31 - 240 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
